title: Isabelle Gougenheim Parfum Scarf
description:
Named after the French word for perfume, the scarf “Parfum” was born from a collaboration between people, art and music. By mixing bright colors, real imagery and text as well as abstract shapes and patterns, the artwork, Isabelle Gougenheim wished to convey in all her paintings: that art is an opportunity to engage in meaningful conversation with the world today.

Details:
• Fabric: 85% Modal x 15% silk
• Size: 54“x 54”
• Designed in Chicago
